content.p: The University of Nottingham is eligible to certify Federal Direct Loan applications for students studying at our UK campuses. Nicola May is responsible for administering US loans for study at the University of Nottingham, guiding you through the process from application to disbursement. Contact Nicola by email Federal funds available to students studying at a 'foreign school'. Guidance regarding the loan application process. Find out if your chosen programme is eligible. Find out about scholarships for study at the University. See answers to some of the most frequently asked questions. See additional information you may find helpful. Guidance regarding the application process for benefits. Information for students from the United States of America. Consumer information the University is required to provide.
